tripleplay.util
Class Input.SizedLayerRegion

java.lang.Object
  tripleplay.util.Input.Region
      tripleplay.util.Input.SizedLayerRegion
Enclosing class:
Input<L>
public static class Input.SizedLayerRegion
extends Input.Region

A region that encompasses the supplied layer's (transformed) bounds. While the layer in question is not visible, the region will not be match clicks. If a reaction using this region is considered for processing and its layer has been removed from the view hierarchy, it will automatically be canceled.

Constructor Summary
Input.SizedLayerRegion(Layer.HasSize layer)
           
 
Method Summary
 boolean canTrigger()
          Returns true if this region can be triggered, false if it's currently invisible.
 boolean hasExpired()
          Returns true if this region is no longer relevant and should be removed.
 boolean hitTest(pythagoras.f.IPoint p)
          Returns true if the (screen-coordinates) point triggers falls in this region.
